description: This Thai-inspired recipe balances the spiciness of satay chicken with the sweetness of mango, delivering a flavour burst thatâ€™s simple and sophisticated.
name: Thai-style Mango Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375g satay-style chicken kebabs, meat removed from skewers
150g green beans, trim ends, halved diagonally

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Spray chicken with oil. Add chicken and cook, stirring, for 6 minutes or until cooked and browned. Transfer to a bowl.
Add beans and 2 tbs water to pan and cook, stirring for 2 minutes or until bright green.
Return chicken to pan and toss for 1 minute or until heated and combined. Add half of the coriander. Season.
Spoon rice into serving bowls. Top with chicken, mango and remaining coriander. Serve.
